name: Triamid Crash
text: Target 1 "Triamid" card you control; destroy it and up to 2 cards on your opponent's side of the field. You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Triamid" card from your Deck to your hand, except for "Triamid Crash". You can only use 1 effect of "Triamid Crash" per turn and only once that turn.
